content: In Greek mythology, which god is associated with the sun, music, poetry, and prophecy?

The god in Greek mythology who is associated with the sun, music, poetry, and prophecy is Apollo. He is one of the most important Olympian deities and is often depicted playing the lyre, which symbolizes his connection to music and poetry. Additionally, Apollo is known for his role as the god of prophecy, with his oracle at Delphi being a central element in many myths and stories. His association with the sun reflects the radiant and life-giving aspects of this celestial body, further emphasizing his significance in Greek culture and religion.
